lg_rule_tip: SEND LUCKY GIFTS HAVE A CHANGE TO GET 1888 TIMES THE GOLD COIN PRIZE
lg_rule_content_1: 1. Send a lucky gift to your friends, and you will have the chance to win up to 1888 times the gold coin prize.
lg_rule_content_2: 2. The more gifts you send out at one time, the greater the probability of winning and the higher the winning multiple.
lg_rule_content_3: 3. The reward multiplier is the multiplier of the gift value.
lg_rule_content_4: 4. The user who received the lucky gift will have {ratio} of the value included in the prize pool of the lucky gift draw, and the rest will belong to the recipient.
lg_rule_content_5: 5. The rewards obtained by users in the lucky gift game are limited to consumption on the Wyak platform and cannot be used for any form of profit-making activities.
lg_rule_content_6: 6. For lucky gifts, only 20% of them will be counted in official events, user levels, and lists.
lg_rule_declaimer: The final interpretation right of the gameplay is explained by the Wyak official
